alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Crawford, northwestern Sebastian, eastern Haskell, eastern Sequoyah, northeastern Latimer and Le Flore Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles south of Short to 4 miles northwest of Bokoshe to 4 miles south of Talimena State Park. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Sallisaw... Poteau... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Alma... Barling... Pocola... Muldrow... Heavener... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Bonanza... Keota... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 304 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northwestern and west central Arkansas...and southeastern and east central Oklahoma.
